name: Help I've Been Reincarnated As A Chimp
name_original: Help I've Been Reincarnated As A Chimp
description:
In this game, you play as a chimpanzee with the memories of a man. Was he a man that was turned into a chimpanzee or merely a chimpanzee with the memories of a man? Time to find out. We wanted to make a JRPG style of game as far as encounters + story beats. There elements of RNG in the fighting as well as the encounters. 

This is our second game jam as a team. We have a few different members this time, and we had a more varied skillset. We were able to experiment with making more sound effects this time as well as working harder on our original art assets. We had a broader idea from the first day, but it eventually got shortened down to this. It was a ton of fun to work on as a team. 

Credits

  • Michael Muniz
  • John Queen
  • Britney Allen
  • Alex Cunningham
  • John Wheeler

Some SFX provided by zapsplat.com including ambient noises, leaves rustling, gun shots, bird calls, and insect noises.
